lexUnit.name: barn.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a large farm building used for storage or for housing livestock.

sentence.text: In the eighteenth century it seemed impossible to build a barn without creating a work of art .
Until you have time and money to build a barn , a rick-yard may be the only alternative .
Is n't it true that someone tried to burn down the barn your Sparrowgrass was stabled in a month ago ?
